title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\SearchCatalogRequest\Scope
name: Scope
description:
The criteria that select the subspace used for query matching.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.SearchCatalogRequest.Scope

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.include_org_ids
params.description: The list of organization IDs to search within. To find your organization ID, follow the steps from [Creating and managing organizations] (/resource-manager/docs/creating-managing-organization).

params.name: data.include_project_ids
params.description: The list of project IDs to search within. For more information on the distinction between project names, IDs, and numbers, see Projects.

params.name: data.include_gcp_public_datasets
params.description: If true, include Google Cloud Platform (GCP) public datasets in search results. By default, they are excluded. See Google Cloud Public Datasets for more information.

params.name: data.restricted_locations
params.description: Optional. The list of locations to search within. If empty, all locations are searched. Returns an error if any location in the list isn't one of the Supported regions. If a location is unreachable, its name is returned in the SearchCatalogResponse.unreachable field. To get additional information on the error, repeat the search request and set the location name as the value of this parameter.

params.name: data.starred_only
params.description: Optional. If true, search only among starred entries. By default, all results are returned, starred or not.

params.name: data.include_public_tag_templates
params.description: Optional. This field is deprecated. The search mechanism for public and private tag templates is the same.

methods.name: getIncludeGcpPublicDatasets
methods.description:
If true, include Google Cloud Platform (GCP) public datasets in search results. By default, they are excluded.

See Google Cloud Public Datasets for more information.

Generated from protobuf field bool include_gcp_public_datasets = 7;

methods.name: getRestrictedLocations
methods.description:
Optional. The list of locations to search within. If empty, all locations are searched.

Returns an error if any location in the list isn't one of the Supported regions. If a location is unreachable, its name is returned in the SearchCatalogResponse.unreachable field. To get additional information on the error, repeat the search request and set the location name as the value of this parameter.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string restricted_locations = 16 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OPTIONAL];

Generated from protobuf field repeated string restricted_locations = 16 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OPTIONAL];
